title: Legendary Physics Book for Self-Study
description:
You can learn physics with this classic textbook by Halliday, Resnick, and Walker. The book is called Fundamentals of Physics and this is Volume 1. There are various editions out there a few are below.

Here is one version: https://amzn.to/3Stg6BY
Newer Edition: https://amzn.to/3IvNaEX
